option.name: originalContent
option.value: <UserControl x:Class="AIMeetDocument.SettingsPanel" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/presentation" xmlns:x="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml" xmlns:mc="http://schemas.openxmlformats.org/markup-compatibility/2006" xmlns:d="http://schemas.microsoft.com/expression/blend/2008" mc:Ignorable="d" d:DesignHeight="768" d:DesignWidth="1360" > <Border Background="#212735" CornerRadius="28" Padding="45" Margin="0,0,0,0" Width="700" Height="700"> <StackPanel> <TextBlock Text="Settings" FontSize="34" Foreground="#FCE49C" HorizontalAlignment="Center" Margin="0,0,0,22" /> <StackPanel Margin="0,0,0,22"> <TextBlock Text="AI Provider:" Foreground="#FCE49C" FontSize="17" /> <StackPanel Orientation="Horizontal" Margin="0,6,0,11"> <RadioButton x:Name="GeminiRadioButton" Content="Gemini" GroupName="AIProvider" Margin="0,0,22,0" Checked="AIProviderRadioButton_Checked" FontSize="17" Foreground="#FCE49C" /> <RadioButton x:Name="LLMStudioRadioButton" Content="LLMStudio" GroupName="AIProvider" Checked="AIProviderRadioButton_Checked" FontSize="17" Foreground="#FCE49C" /> </StackPanel> <StackPanel x:Name="LLMStudioPanel"> <TextBlock Text="Server URL:" Foreground="#FCE49C" FontSize="17" /> <TextBox x:Name="ServerUrlTextBox" Margin="0,6,0,11" FontSize="17" Height="34"> <TextBox.Style> <Style TargetType="TextBox"> <Setter Property="BorderThickness" Value="2" /> <Setter Property="BorderBrush" Value="#FCE49C" /> <Setter Property="Background" Value="#fee79e" /> <Setter Property="Foreground" Value="#212735" /> <Setter Property="Padding" Value="8,2" /> <Setter Property="Template"> <Setter.Value> <ControlTemplate TargetType="TextBox"> <Border CornerRadius="12" BorderBrush="{TemplateBinding BorderBrush}" BorderThickness="{TemplateBinding BorderThickness}" Background="{TemplateBinding Background}"> <ScrollViewer x:Name="PART_ContentHost" /> </Border> </ControlTemplate> </Setter.Value> </Setter> </Style> </TextBox.Style> </TextBox> <TextBlock Text="Model:" Foreground="#FCE49C" FontSize="17" /> <TextBox x:Name="LLMStudioModelTextBox" Margin="0,6,0,11" FontSize="17" Height="34"> <TextBox.Style> <Style TargetType="TextBox"> <Setter Property="BorderThickness" Value="2" /> <Setter Property="BorderBrush" Value="#FCE49C" /> <Setter Property="Background" Value="#fee79e" /> <Setter Property="Foreground" Value="#212735" /> <Setter Property="Padding" Value="8,2" /> <Setter Property="Template"> <Setter.Value> <ControlTemplate TargetType="TextBox"> <Border CornerRadius="12" BorderBrush="{TemplateBinding BorderBrush}" BorderThickness="{TemplateBinding BorderThickness}" Background="{TemplateBinding Background}"> <ScrollViewer x:Name="PART_ContentHost" /> </Border> </ControlTemplate> </Setter.Value> </Setter> </Style> </TextBox.Style> </TextBox> </StackPanel> <StackPanel x:Name="GeminiPanel"> <TextBlock Text="API Key:" Foreground="#FCE49C" FontSize="17" /> <TextBox x:Name="ApiKeyTextBox" Margin="0,6,0,11" FontSize="17" Height="34"> <TextBox.Style> <Style TargetType="TextBox"> <Setter Property="BorderThickness" Value="2" /> <Setter Property="BorderBrush" Value="#FCE49C" /> <Setter Property="Background" Value="#fee79e" /> <Setter Property="Foreground" Value="#212735" /> <Setter Property="Padding" Value="8,2" /> <Setter Property="Template"> <Setter.Value> <ControlTemplate TargetType="TextBox"> <Border CornerRadius="12" BorderBrush="{TemplateBinding BorderBrush}" BorderThickness="{TemplateBinding BorderThickness}" Background="{TemplateBinding Background}"> <ScrollViewer x:Name="PART_ContentHost" /> </Border> </ControlTemplate> </Setter.Value> </Setter> </Style> </TextBox.Style> </TextBox> <TextBlock Text="Model:" Foreground="#FCE49C" FontSize="17" /> <ComboBox x:Name="GeminiModelComboBox" Margin="0,6,0,11" Background="#fee79e" FontSize="17" Height="34"> <ComboBoxItem Content="Gemini-2.5-Flash" /> <ComboBoxItem Content="Gemini-2.5-Pro" /> </ComboBox> </StackPanel> <TextBlock Text="System Prompt:" Foreground="#FCE49C" FontSize="17" /> <TextBox x:Name="SystemPromptTextBox" Margin="0,6,0,11" FontSize="17" Height="160" MaxLength="3000" AcceptsReturn="True" VerticalScrollBarVisibility="Auto" Background="#fee79e" TextWrapping="Wrap" MinLines="4"> <TextBox.Style> <Style TargetType="TextBox"> <Setter Property="BorderThickness" Value="2" /> <Setter Property="BorderBrush" Value="#FCE49C" /> <Setter Property="Background" Value="#fee79e" /> <Setter Property="Foreground" Value="#212735" /> <Setter Property="Padding" Value="8,2" /> <Setter Property="Template"> <Setter.Value> <ControlTemplate TargetType="TextBox"> <Border CornerRadius="12" BorderBrush="{TemplateBinding BorderBrush}" BorderThickness="{TemplateBinding BorderThickness}" Background="{TemplateBinding Background}"> <ScrollViewer x:Name="PART_ContentHost" /> </Border> </ControlTemplate> </Setter.Value> </Setter> </Style> </TextBox.Style> </TextBox> </StackPanel> <Grid VerticalAlignment="Bottom" Margin="0,30,0,0"> <Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <ColumnDefinition Width="*" /> <ColumnDefinition Width="Auto" /> </Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <Button Content="Default" Style="{StaticResource ModernButton}" Click="ResetDefault_Click" FontSize="17" Height="34" MinWidth="84" HorizontalAlignment="Left" Grid.Column="0" /> <Button Content="Save" Style="{StaticResource ModernButton}" Click="Save_Click" FontSize="17" Height="34" MinWidth="84" HorizontalAlignment="Right" Grid.Column="1" Margin="30,0,0,0" /> </Grid> </StackPanel> </Border> </UserControl>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value: <UserControl x:Class="AIMeetDocument.SettingsPanel" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/presentation" xmlns:x="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml" xmlns:mc="http://schemas.openxmlformats.org/markup-compatibility/2006" xmlns:d="http://schemas.microsoft.com/expression/blend/2008" mc:Ignorable="d" d:DesignHeight="768" d:DesignWidth="1360" > <Border Background="#212735" CornerRadius="28" Padding="45" Margin="0,0,0,0" Width="700" Height="700" d:DesignHeight="900"> <StackPanel> <TextBlock Text="Settings" FontSize="34" Foreground="#FCE49C" HorizontalAlignment="Center" Margin="0,0,0,22" /> <StackPanel Margin="0,0,0,22"> <TextBlock Text="AI Provider:" Foreground="#FCE49C" FontSize="17" /> <StackPanel Orientation="Horizontal" Margin="0,6,0,11"> <RadioButton x:Name="GeminiRadioButton" Content="Gemini" GroupName="AIProvider" Margin="0,0,22,0" Checked="AIProviderRadioButton_Checked" FontSize="17" Foreground="#FCE49C" /> <RadioButton x:Name="LLMStudioRadioButton" Content="LLMStudio" GroupName="AIProvider" Checked="AIProviderRadioButton_Checked" FontSize="17" Foreground="#FCE49C" /> </StackPanel> <StackPanel x:Name="LLMStudioPanel"> <TextBlock Text="Server URL:" Foreground="#FCE49C" FontSize="17" /> <TextBox x:Name="ServerUrlTextBox" Margin="0,6,0,11" FontSize="17" Height="34"> <TextBox.Style> <Style TargetType="TextBox"> <Setter Property="BorderThickness" Value="2" /> <Setter Property="BorderBrush" Value="#FCE49C" /> <Setter Property="Background" Value="#fee79e" /> <Setter Property="Foreground" Value="#212735" /> <Setter Property="Padding" Value="8,2" /> <Setter Property="Template"> <Setter.Value> <ControlTemplate TargetType="TextBox"> <Border CornerRadius="12" BorderBrush="{TemplateBinding BorderBrush}" BorderThickness="{TemplateBinding BorderThickness}" Background="{TemplateBinding Background}"> <ScrollViewer x:Name="PART_ContentHost" /> </Border> </ControlTemplate> </Setter.Value> </Setter> </Style> </TextBox.Style> </TextBox> <TextBlock Text="Model:" Foreground="#FCE49C" FontSize="17" /> <TextBox x:Name="LLMStudioModelTextBox" Margin="0,6,0,11" FontSize="17" Height="34"> <TextBox.Style> <Style TargetType="TextBox"> <Setter Property="BorderThickness" Value="2" /> <Setter Property="BorderBrush" Value="#FCE49C" /> <Setter Property="Background" Value="#fee79e" /> <Setter Property="Foreground" Value="#212735" /> <Setter Property="Padding" Value="8,2" /> <Setter Property="Template"> <Setter.Value> <ControlTemplate TargetType="TextBox"> <Border CornerRadius="12" BorderBrush="{TemplateBinding BorderBrush}" BorderThickness="{TemplateBinding BorderThickness}" Background="{TemplateBinding Background}"> <ScrollViewer x:Name="PART_ContentHost" /> </Border> </ControlTemplate> </Setter.Value> </Setter> </Style> </TextBox.Style> </TextBox> </StackPanel> <StackPanel x:Name="GeminiPanel"> <TextBlock Text="API Key:" Foreground="#FCE49C" FontSize="17" /> <TextBox x:Name="ApiKeyTextBox" Margin="0,6,0,11" FontSize="17" Height="34"> <TextBox.Style> <Style TargetType="TextBox"> <Setter Property="BorderThickness" Value="2" /> <Setter Property="BorderBrush" Value="#FCE49C" /> <Setter Property="Background" Value="#fee79e" /> <Setter Property="Foreground" Value="#212735" /> <Setter Property="Padding" Value="8,2" /> <Setter Property="Template"> <Setter.Value> <ControlTemplate TargetType="TextBox"> <Border CornerRadius="12" BorderBrush="{TemplateBinding BorderBrush}" BorderThickness="{TemplateBinding BorderThickness}" Background="{TemplateBinding Background}"> <ScrollViewer x:Name="PART_ContentHost" /> </Border> </ControlTemplate> </Setter.Value> </Setter> </Style> </TextBox.Style> </TextBox> <TextBlock Text="Model:" Foreground="#FCE49C" FontSize="17" /> <ComboBox x:Name="GeminiModelComboBox" Margin="0,6,0,11" Background="#fee79e" FontSize="17" Height="34"> <ComboBoxItem Content="Gemini-2.5-Flash" /> <ComboBoxItem Content="Gemini-2.5-Pro" /> </ComboBox> </StackPanel> <TextBlock Text="System Prompt:" Foreground="#FCE49C" FontSize="17" /> <TextBox x:Name="SystemPromptTextBox" Margin="0,6,0,11" FontSize="17" Height="160" MaxLength="3000" AcceptsReturn="True" VerticalScrollBarVisibility="Auto" Background="#fee79e" TextWrapping="Wrap" MinLines="4"> <TextBox.Style> <Style TargetType="TextBox"> <Setter Property="BorderThickness" Value="2" /> <Setter Property="BorderBrush" Value="#FCE49C" /> <Setter Property="Background" Value="#fee79e" /> <Setter Property="Foreground" Value="#212735" /> <Setter Property="Padding" Value="8,2" /> <Setter Property="Template"> <Setter.Value> <ControlTemplate TargetType="TextBox"> <Border CornerRadius="12" BorderBrush="{TemplateBinding BorderBrush}" BorderThickness="{TemplateBinding BorderThickness}" Background="{TemplateBinding Background}"> <ScrollViewer x:Name="PART_ContentHost" /> </Border> </ControlTemplate> </Setter.Value> </Setter> </Style> </TextBox.Style> </TextBox> </StackPanel> <Grid VerticalAlignment="Bottom" Margin="0,30,0,0"> <Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <ColumnDefinition Width="*" /> <ColumnDefinition Width="Auto" /> </Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <Button Content="Default" Style="{StaticResource ModernButton}" Click="ResetDefault_Click" FontSize="17" Height="34" MinWidth="84" HorizontalAlignment="Left" Grid.Column="0" /> <Button Content="Save" Style="{StaticResource ModernButton}" Click="Save_Click" FontSize="17" Height="34" MinWidth="84" HorizontalAlignment="Right" Grid.Column="1" Margin="30,0,0,0" /> </Grid> </StackPanel> </Border> </UserControl>
